subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What models of plastic recycling machines do you offer?
faqs.answer: Our range includes a variety of plastic recycling machines such as PET bottle recycling lines, PE/PP film recycling machines, and plastic pelletizing machines. Each model is designed to meet different scales of recycling needs, ensuring efficiency and reliability.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade my current recycling machine to a newer model?
faqs.answer: Yes, upgrades are possible and recommended to keep your operations modern and efficient. We provide upgrade kits and professional support to help transition your current setup to the latest technology available in our product line.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of bulk purchasing recycling machines from your company?
faqs.answer: Clients who order in bulk benefit from substantial discounts, extended warranties, and personalized after-sales services. The specifics can vary based on the order size and machine models, so please contact our sales team for a customized proposal.

faqs.question: What type of customer support do you provide for your recycling machines?
faqs.answer: All our customers enjoy comprehensive support which includes installation guidance, operational training, and troubleshooting. Higher-tier packages such as our Premium Support Plan offer 24/7 technical assistance and regular maintenance visits.

faqs.question: How often are your machine manuals and operating instructions updated?
faqs.answer: We update our machine manuals and operating instructions regularly to incorporate the latest safety guidelines, technological improvements, and troubleshooting tips. All updates are made available online to our current customers at no additional cost.

faqs.question: Does your company provide turnkey solutions for industrial recycling projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in providing complete turnkey solutions for industrial-scale recycling projects. This includes project assessment, system design, machine installation, and operational training, tailored to meet your specific requirements.
